properties.areaDesc: Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Dorchester; Wicomico
properties.headline: Flood Watch issued February 5 at 10:23PM EST until February 7 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
The Flood Watch continues for

* A portion of southeast Maryland, including the following
areas, Dorchester, Inland Worcester, Maryland Beaches,
Somerset, and Wicomico.

* From Thursday afternoon through Friday morning

* An extended period of rainfall with moderate to high rainfall
rates is expected late Thursday afternoon into Friday morning
and will lead to conditions favorable for flooding. Rainfall
totals are expected to average 2 to 3 inches through Friday
morning, with locally higher amounts possible.

* Rapid rises on rivers and creeks are likely, along with
flooding in low lying and poor drainage areas.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Watch means there is a potential for flooding based on
current forecasts.

You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible
Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be
prepared to take action should flooding develop.

NWSheadline: FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING
